name: Where to Root
description:
Control your seedlings to grow trees which spawn more seedlings. Your goal is to have a tree on every one of the four corners / zones of the map. Careful, it gets crowded and chaotic!

This game can be played single player against AI, or multiplayer using your phone or tablet as controller.

Made for the global game jam 2023 by 

Joey Poortman: art, voice acting, game design

Sjoerd Kuperus: game programming, game design, sound and vfx, web design

Erwin Bonsma: game programming lead, game design

Paul Bonsma: game programming, game design, network programming
